Returns "DevExpress_Xpf_Reports_Ribbon_rpDesigner". Corresponds to the Report Designer tab that activates the report's design mode.
Returns "DevExpress_Xpf_Reports_Ribbon_rgEdit". Corresponds to the Edit toolbar group that contains items for editing report elements.
Returns "DevExpress_Xpf_Reports_Ribbon_rgEditors". Corresponds to the Editors toolbar group that contains buttons for invoking dedicated dialogs.
Returns "DevExpress_Xpf_Reports_Ribbon_bFontBold". Corresponds to the toolbar item that applies/removes bold formatting to/from the selected report elements.
Returns "DevExpress_Xpf_Reports_Ribbon_rgFont". Corresponds to the Font toolbar groups that contains items for customizing font, color, formatting and alignment settings of report controls.
Returns "DevExpress_Xpf_Reports_Ribbon_bFontItalic". Corresponds to the toolbar item that applies/removes italic formatting to/from the selected report elements.
Returns "DevExpress_Xpf_Reports_Ribbon_bFontName". Corresponds to the toolbar item that specifies the font name of the selected report elements.
Returns "DevExpress_Xpf_Reports_Ribbon_bFontSize". Corresponds to the toolbar item that specifies the font size of the selected report elements.
Returns "DevExpress_Xpf_Reports_Ribbon_bFontStrikeOut". Corresponds to the toolbar item that applies/removes strikethrough to/from the selected report elements.
Returns "DevExpress_Xpf_Reports_Ribbon_bFontUnderline". Corresponds to the toolbar item that applies/removes underlining to/from the selected report elements.
Returns "DevExpress_Xpf_Reports_Ribbon_bForeground". Corresponds to the toolbar item that specifies the foreground color of the selected report elements.
Returns "DevExpress_Xpf_Reports_Ribbon_bHorizontalSpaceConcatenate". Corresponds to the Remove Horizontal Spacing button of the Layout toolbar group.
Returns "DevExpress_Xpf_Reports_Ribbon_bHorizontalSpaceDecrease". Corresponds to the Decrease Horizontal Spacing button of the Layout toolbar group.
Returns "DevExpress_Xpf_Reports_Ribbon_bHorizontalSpaceIncrease". Corresponds to the Increase Horizontal Spacing button of the Layout toolbar group.
Returns "DevExpress_Xpf_Reports_Ribbon_bHorizontalSpaceMakeEqual". Corresponds to the Make Horizontal Spacing Equal button of the Layout toolbar group.
Returns "DevExpress_Xpf_Reports_Ribbon_rgLayout". Corresponds to the Layout toolbar group caption.
Returns "DevExpress_Xpf_Reports_Ribbon_bNew". Corresponds to the New toolbar button that creates a new report using the Report Wizard.
Returns "DevExpress_Xpf_Reports_Ribbon_bOpen". Corresponds to the Open toolbar button that invokes the Open dialog for selecting the report to be loaded.
Returns "DevExpress_Xpf_Reports_Ribbon_bPageSetup". Corresponds to the Page Setup toolbar button that invokes the Page Setup dialog.
Returns "DevExpress_Xpf_Reports_Ribbon_bPaste". Corresponds to the Paste toolbar button that pastes the contents of the clipboard to the selected report band.
Returns "DevExpress_Xpf_Reports_Ribbon_rpPreview". Corresponds to the Print Preview tab that activates the report's preview mode.
Returns "DevExpress_Xpf_Reports_Ribbon_bRedo". Corresponds to the Redo toolbar button that reverses the results of the last undo action.
Returns "DevExpress_Xpf_Reports_Ribbon_rgReport". Correspond to the Report toolbar group that contains buttons for saving and loading reports.
Returns "DevExpress_Xpf_Reports_Ribbon_bSave". Corresponds to the Save toolbar button that saves the current report to the file.
Returns "DevExpress_Xpf_Reports_Ribbon_bSaveAs". Corresponds to the Save As toolbar button that invokes the Save dialog allowing you to select a file for saving the report.
Returns "DevExpress_Xpf_Reports_Ribbon_bScripts". Corresponds to the Scripts toolbar button that shows/hides the Script Editor.
Returns "DevExpress_Xpf_Reports_Ribbon_bSendBackward". Corresponds to the toolbar item that moves the selected report elements one step toward the back.
Returns "DevExpress_Xpf_Reports_Ribbon_bSendToBack". Corresponds to the toolbar item that sends the selected report elements to the back of a group of stacked elements.
Returns "DevExpress_Xpf_Reports_Ribbon_bSendToBackSelector". Corresponds to the Send to Back toolbar button that sends the selected report elements toward the back.
Returns "DevExpress_Xpf_Reports_Ribbon_bSizeToControl". Corresponds to the Make Same Size button of the Layout toolbar group.
Returns "DevExpress_Xpf_Reports_Ribbon_bSizeToControlHeight". Corresponds to the Make Same Height button of the Layout toolbar group.
Returns "DevExpress_Xpf_Reports_Ribbon_bSizeToControlWidth". Corresponds to the Make Same Width button of the Layout toolbar group.
Returns "DevExpress_Xpf_Reports_Ribbon_bSizeToGrid". Corresponds to the Size to Grid button of the Layout toolbar group.
Returns "DevExpress_Xpf_Reports_Ribbon_bTextAlignCenter". Corresponds to the toolbar item that horizontally aligns the text of the selected report elements at the center.
Returns "DevExpress_Xpf_Reports_Ribbon_bTextAlignJustify". Corresponds to the toolbar item that horizontally justifies the text of the selected report elements.
Returns "DevExpress_Xpf_Reports_Ribbon_bTextAlignLeft". Corresponds to the toolbar item that horizontally aligns the text of the selected report elements on the left.
Returns "DevExpress_Xpf_Reports_Ribbon_bTextAlignRight". Corresponds to the toolbar item that horizontally aligns the text of the selected report elements on the right.
Returns "DevExpress_Xpf_Reports_Ribbon_bTextHorAlignSelector". Corresponds to toolbar items that specify the horizontal text alignment of the selected report elements.
Returns "DevExpress_Xpf_Reports_Ribbon_bTextAlignBottom". Corresponds to the toolbar item that vertically aligns the text of the selected report elements at the bottom.
Returns "DevExpress_Xpf_Reports_Ribbon_bTextAlignMiddle". Corresponds to the toolbar item that vertically aligns the text of the selected report elements in the middle.
Returns "DevExpress_Xpf_Reports_Ribbon_bTextVertAlignSelector". Corresponds to toolbar items that specify the vertical text alignment of the selected report elements.
Returns "DevExpress_Xpf_Reports_Ribbon_bTextAlignTop". Corresponds to the toolbar item that vertically aligns the text of the selected report elements at the top.
Returns "DevExpress_Xpf_Reports_Ribbon_bUndo". Corresponds to the Undo toolbar button that cancels the last change made to the report.
Returns "DevExpress_Xpf_Reports_Ribbon_bVerticalSpaceConcatenate". Corresponds to the Remove Vertical Spacing button of the Layout toolbar group.
Returns "DevExpress_Xpf_Reports_Ribbon_bVerticalSpaceDecrease". Corresponds to the Decrease Vertical Spacing button of the Layout toolbar group.
Returns "DevExpress_Xpf_Reports_Ribbon_bVerticalSpaceIncrease". Corresponds to the Increase Vertical Spacing button of the Layout toolbar group.
Returns "DevExpress_Xpf_Reports_Ribbon_bVerticalSpaceMakeEqual". Corresponds to the Make Vertical Spacing Equal button of the Layout toolbar group.
Returns "DevExpress_Xpf_Reports_Ribbon_bWatermark". Corresponds to the Watermark toolbar button that invokes the Watermark dialog.
